charge_title: The title of the subject Charge (e.g. 'Swimming Fees 2021').
charge_token: The DataBiz token of the subject Charge.
charge_due_from: The dd-mm-YYYY date from which the subject Charge's fees are due.
charge_due_to: The dd-mm-YYYY date to which the subject Charge's fees are due.
charge_type: The subject Charge's type (e.g. 'Each individual charged independently').
family_fees_outstanding_en: The subject pupil and fee amount for each of the subject family's outstanding Fees (English language version: displays as a list - A fee of X for Y).
family_fees_outstanding_ga: The subject pupil and fee amount for each of the subject family's outstanding Fees (English language version: displays as a list - TÃ¡ille de X do Y).
